item.description:
Dear improvisers,

We now have a developing sense of what show day will look like. In this rehearsal, we will master the nuts and bolts of our show. We will go over warm-up routines, introductions, develop the order in which we perform our games, master transitions, and prepare our close. In addition to practicing the games we've learned up until now, we will learn a new game that centers around a single audience member.

Our goal is to construct a performance that will connect with audience members while entertaining everyone involved. In rehearsal, we will work towards projecting an appropriate energy for performing in places of therapy.

Since we are approaching our first performance (TBD), it is especially important that all regulars attend. Others that have not been attending quite so regularly are, as always, a valued addition to our rehearsal.

Looking forward,
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Meeting 7: Developing Our Show
